text: Luder returns from his usual walk down the malecon. I'm confused, he says. As I was getting ready to enjoy a new sunset, a drifter jumps the curb, walks to the edge of the cliff, comes down his pants and shit himself looking at my twilight. That demonstrates the relativity of our aesthetic conceptions. Finished by Luder, 1989
title: La relatividad de nuestras concepciones estéticas
author: Julio Ramón Ribeyro
